alert.note: Alert for Escambia (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 05 at 5:35PM CST until February 10 at 4:30AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Florida... Escambia River Near Century affecting Escambia County. For the Escambia River...including Century...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Escambia River Near Century. * WHEN...Until early Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 19 feet, Low lying pastures will flood. Cattle should be moved to higher ground. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:05 PM CST Saturday the stage was 17 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 19.5 feet Monday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 17 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
